name: Bit.ly Resolver - Chrome Extension
body:
### Bit.ly Resolver - Chrome Extension
Were you even scared to click a bit.ly link? Not knowing where it might lead?
That is only one reason to use the extension, other reasons can simply be the
mere fact that a bit.ly link just doesn't give you any context of the page it
takes you to.
Looking at http://bit.ly/2f8ShOM won't tell you anything. 
But looking at http://www.cool-cat-tshirts.com/ tells you all you need to know.

Enjoy

![Screenshot](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/32d4ec_1104e84ef06b418e9238342494cb9e2b~mv2.png)

### Authors and Contributors
